descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00]Chrysamere Resurrection[/color] Eng/Rus

Authors:
Ronnie Magnum - meshes, textures, location
9RedMen - navmeshes

[color=#ffff00]Vesrion[/color]: 1.0
[color=#ffff00]Requirements[/color]: Skyrim

This mod adds the legendary Chrysamere sword from the earlier TES games. It can be obtained in the "Hermit's shelter" northeast from Markarth. This sword enchanted to cause an additional damage to the enemies of the Empire, such as bandits, Thalmor agents, necromancers, vampires and daedra. Improvement material - corundum.

***

[color=#ffff00]!!!USE ONLY 1 ESP-FILE!!![/color]

***
